preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM role_permission rp INNER JOIN role r ON rp.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE r.name = 'Readonly' AND p.name IN ('IMPORT_GERMPLASM', 'SEARCH_GERMPLASM', 'IMPORT_GERMPLASM_UPDATES', 'GERMPLASM_LABEL_PRINTING');

changeSet.comment: Remove germplasm import permissions for readonly user role
changeSet.sql: DELETE role_permission FROM role_permission INNER JOIN role ON role_permission.role_id = role.id INNER JOIN permission ON role_permission.permission_id = permission.permission_id WHERE role.name = 'Readonly' AND permission.name IN ('IMPORT_GERMPLASM_UPDATES', 'IMPORT_GERMPLASM');
